/** * Collects data from the DropBoxManager introduced with Android API Level 8. A * set of DropBox tags have been identified in the Android source code. , we * collect data associated to these tags with hope that some of them could help * debugging applications. Application specific tags can be provided by the app * dev to track his own usage of the DropBoxManager. * * @author Kevin Gaudin * */
